com.bumptech.glide
Class Glide

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.Glide

public class Glide
extends java.lang.Object

A singleton to present a simple static interface for Glide Glide.ModelRequest and to create and manage an ImageLoader and ModelLoaderFactorys. This class provides most of the functionality of ImagePresenter with a simpler but less efficient interface. For more complicated cases it may be worth considering using ImagePresenter and ImagePresenter.Builder directly.

Note - This class is not thread safe.

static class Glide.VideoModelRequest<T>
          A helper class for building requests with custom ModelLoaders that translate models to ParcelFileDescriptor resources for loading video thumbnails.

isImageManagerSet

public boolean isImageManagerSet()
Use to check whether or not an ImageManager has been set yet. Can be used in Activity.onCreate along with setImageManager to set an ImageManager with custom options for use with Glide.ModelRequest and/or as an easily accessible singleton.

Returns:
true iff an ImageManager is currently set

register

public <T,Y> void register(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass,
                           java.lang.Class<Y> resourceClass,
                           ModelLoaderFactory<T,Y> factory)
Use the given factory to build a ModelLoader for models of the given class. Generally the best use of this method is to replace one of the default factories or add an implementation for other similar low level models. Typically the Glide.ModelRequest.using(StreamModelLoader) or Glide.ModelRequest.using(FileDescriptorModelLoader) syntax is preferred because it directly links the model with the ModelLoader being used to load it.

Note - If a factory already exists for the given class, it will be replaced. If that factory is not being used for any other model class, ModelLoaderFactory.teardown() will be called.

Note - The factory must not be an anonymous inner class of an Activity or another object that cannot be retained statically.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the model.
Y - the type of the resource.
Parameters:
modelClass - The model class.
resourceClass - The resource class the model loader will translate the model type into.
factory - The factory to use.
See Also:
Glide.ModelRequest.using(FileDescriptorModelLoader), Glide.ModelRequest.using(StreamModelLoader)

buildModelLoader

public static <T,Y> ModelLoader<T,Y> buildModelLoader(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass,
                                                      java.lang.Class<Y> resourceClass,
                                                      android.content.Context context)
Build a ModelLoader for the given model class using a registered factory.

Parameters:

context - Any context
Returns:

Throws:

cancel

public static boolean cancel(Target target)
Cancel any pending loads Glide may have for the target. After the load is cancelled Glide will not load a placeholder or bitmap into the target so it is safe to do so yourself until you start another load.

Parameters:
target - The Target to cancel loads for
Returns:
True iff Glide had ever been asked to load an image for this target

with

public static Glide.ModelRequest with(android.content.Context context)
Begin a load with Glide by passing in a context.

Parameters:
context - Any context, will not be retained.
Returns:
A model request to pass in the object representing the image to be loaded.
